nodes.name: Pinterest Analysis AI Agent

parameters.text:
You are a data analysis expert. You will pull data from the table and provide any information in regards to trends in the data. 

Your output should be suggestions of new pins that we can post to reach the target audiences. 

Analyze the data and just summary of the pin suggestions that the team should build.

nodes.notes: This agent node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Pinterest Data Analysis Summary LLM

values.prompt:
=Write a concise summary of the following:


"{{ $json.output }}"


CONCISE SUMMARY:

nodes.notes: This chainSummarization node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Send Marketing Trends & Pinterest Analysis To Marketing Manager
nodes.notes: This gmail node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note

parameters.content:
Scheduled trigger at 8:00am to start the workflow. 

This can be updated to your schedule preference as an email with marketing trends can be sent to best fit one's schedule.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note1

parameters.content:
Scheduled trigger begin process to gather Pinterest Pin data and store them within Airtable. This data can be referenced or analyzed accordingly. 

*If you would like to bring in Pinterest Ads data, the data is already labeled as Organic.

This is perfect for those who are creating content calendars to understand content scheduling.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Sticky Note2

parameters.content:
AI Agent will go through Pinterest Pins and analyze any data and trends to be able to reach target audience. The data is then summarized within the Summary LLM.

The summarized results are then sent to the Marketing Manager within an email to help lead content creation efforts.

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.

nodes.name: Workflow Documentation

parameters.content:
# Automate Pinterest Analysis & AI-Powered Content Suggestions With Pinterest API

## Overview
Automated workflow: Automate Pinterest Analysis & AI-Powered Content Suggestions With Pinterest API. This workflow integrates 11 different services: stickyNote, httpRequest, airtable, code, scheduleTrigger. It contains 17 nodes and follows best practices for error handling and security.

## Workflow Details
- **Total Nodes**: 17
- **Node Types**: 11
- **Error Handling**: ✅ Implemented
- **Security**: ✅ Hardened (no sensitive data)
- **Documentation**: ✅ Complete

## Node Breakdown
- **OpenAI Chat Model**: lmChatOpenAi
- **Airtable2**: airtableTool
- **OpenAI Chat Model1**: lmChatOpenAi
- **8:00am Morning Scheduled Trigger**: scheduleTrigger
- **Pull List of Pinterest Pins From Account**: httpRequest
- **Update Data Field To Include Organic**: code
- **Create Record Within Pinterest Data Table**: airtable
- **Pinterest Analysis AI Agent**: agent
- **Pinterest Data Analysis Summary LLM**: chainSummarization
- **Send Marketing Trends & Pinterest Analysis To Marketing Manager**: gmail
- ... and 7 more nodes

## Usage Instructions
1. **Configure Credentials**: Set up all required API keys and credentials
2. **Update Variables**: Replace any placeholder values with actual data
3. **Test Workflow**: Run in test mode to verify functionality
4. **Deploy**: Activate the workflow for production use

## Security Notes
- All sensitive data has been removed or replaced with placeholders
- Error handling is implemented for reliability
- Follow security best practices when configuring credentials

## Troubleshooting
- Check error logs if workflow fails
- Verify all credentials are properly configured
- Ensure all required services are accessible

nodes.notes: This stickyNote node performs automated tasks as part of the workflow.
